message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!

I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to see if we can come to a mutually agreeable price.

Bob, I understand your position, but $950,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This price reflects the value of the product while still allowing you a decent profit. I hope you'll reconsider.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1,025,000. I think this is a fair price for both of us, considering the product's value and my budget.
